description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The History of Herodotus. A new English version, edited with copious notes and appendices ... embodying the chief results, historical and ethnographical, which have been obtained in the progress of Cuneiform and Hieroglyphical discovery. By G. Rawlinson ... assisted by Sir H. Rawlinson and Sir J. G. Wilkinson.]", "English" Author: Herodotus. Contributor: RAWLINSON, Henry Creswicke - Sir, Bart Contributor: RAWLINSON, George - Professor of Ancient History in the University of Oxford Contributor: WILKINSON, John Gardner - Sir Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9025.g.16." Volume: 02 Page: 479 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1862 Edition: New edition. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001664656 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
